item.title: Using a custom openconnect version for VPN
item.description: My company use Palo Alto Networks to offer a VPN service for their employees. Personally I prefer Openvpn software, of course, because it is Open Source. I don’t know, but the openconnect version installed by default in my Fedora 26 haven’t the protocol support for GLobal Protect of Palo Alto, so for that reason, I had to compile a custom version of this software. Here is the procediment to compile it, and here are the my own steps to run it
